name: Whacker Guy: Distance Hunter
description: Whacker Guy: Distance Hunter is a 3D physics-based baseball batting game set in a beautiful ballpark (Whacker Stadium) with a specific goal - accumulated distance. Total distance is the score. Skill is required to be great and must be learned!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 SP1+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 140 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
